1385090.name: Grand Father ISLAND
1385090.description:
EGEA Game presents GRAND FATHER ISLAND with particular attention to artistic direction and emotional storytelling.
An adventure in the heart of the mountains, a journey that addresses the protection of nature and the relationship of man with, the relationships of couples, the principles of our daily life and why we are here ...
A tribute to love and peace in a poetic tale on a magical island to pay a final tribute to a loved one.
Wait no longer, an extraordinary journey awaits you!
for fans of atmospheric walking simulator such as shelter, journey, What Remains of Edith Finch etc

Functionality:

A story full of poetry.
Varied environment.
different puzzles
A graphic style with the grain of a 16:9 camera approaching the animation film.
a large map without loading.
A touch of platform.
A relaxing Adventure.
1385090.supported_languages:
英语, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
